name: Elite Sniper Cover Shoot
description:
Test your shooting skills by playing as the last sniper commando play sniper shoot revenge game that feels almost like real life. Revenge everything that was taken from you and kill the terrorists using your sniper 3D rifle! Save your city from the terrorists without worry of own life!

FEATURES
Unlimited challenging battle missions
Real Crime 3d environment
Best sound effects
Realistic and super 3D city combat environment
Realistic 3D graphics and amazing killing effects
Use the RPG to shot down battle the enemies
